CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 5, 1973, pg. 9 reads: "Fashion Extravaganza - The Homewood-Brushton Community Improvement Associations, Inc., recently resented a Fashion Show Extravaganza at Sumpter Hall on Lincoln Avenue. The show featured the Frederick Models, Inc., with Mrs. Lorraine McCoad and Frederick Wims as commentators, Mrs. Gladys Howell was chairman and music was by Bill Gambrell.  Models are from left to right: Gerri Walker (Mrs. McCoad can be seen at microphone), Hilda Laverne Logan, Freddie Weaver, Pat White, and Carol Walls. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Man, possibly Freddie Weaver, modeling long light colored shirt, hat, sunglasses, and heeled boots, walking down runway for Fashion Show Extravaganza, Sumpter Hall, with Lorraine McCoad holding microphone in background
